'''Treasure from the Land of Wisdom''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Treasure from the Land of Wisdom is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
